author: Epic Games
description:
Don't let the feathers fool you — in Escape From Duckov, every mission is a deadly fight for survival.​ The Official Launch Trailer is here and the game is NOW AVAILABLE on the Epic Games Store! https://epic.gm/duckov

Dive into the wild, chaotic world of this top-down PvE looter-extraction shooter. Scavenge the best gear, customize your feathered fighter, and fight tooth and beak to escape with your life.

The wait is over! To celebrate, we're kicking things off with a 12% launch discount for the first two weeks! Get it now for just $15.83 (regularly $17.99).

Watch the full trailer, grab the game, and start your extraction career today!
title: Escape From Duckov | Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
The Jupiter Stormers joined the tournament to push the boundaries of speed and science. Because for them, progress comes at 300km/h. Meet the methodical minds on the track.
 
Wishlist Now on the Epic Games Store: https://epic.gm/screamer
title: Screamer | Jupiter Stormers Reveal Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
Don't miss the official gameplay trailer for Where Winds Meet, an epic Wuxia open world action-adventure game developed by Everstone Studio. 

Set during the turbulent era of tenth-century China, you take on the role of a young sword master, uncovering forgotten truths and the mysteries of your own identity. As the wind stirs across mountains and rivers, so too will your legend rise.
 
Where Winds Meet will be available on November 14 (3PM ET).
Wishlist Now! https://epic.gm/wwm
title: Where Winds Meet | Official Gameplay Video
